page.title: 12LEISURE-MEN AND ADULTS
page.content:
There has been a{Merton {Football Club}for many years but the present club dates from 1969. Home matches are played on the{Playing {Field}and changing facilities are available in the{Parish Hall}.During the 1984-85 season the club's only team finished 4th. in the Senior Division of the North Devon League.
{The Maltscoop Inn}is for many adults the hub of village life.In addition to the opportunity to buy refreshment,relax in the company of friends and hear all the local news it gives regular patrons a chance to play Darts either in fun or in the pub's successful team.The{Maltscoop Inn}has been in the same family since 1906 when it was taken over by the present landlord's wife's grandparents.At that time it also offered a coach service.
